item.title: Ex-senior Federal Reserve advisor charged with economic espionage to benefit China
item.description: The DOJ unveiled espionage claims against former Fed employee John Harold Rogers as President Donald Trump threatened China with tariffs.

item.title: Musk aides lock government workers out of computer systems at U.S. agency: Reuters
item.description: Actions inside the Office of Personnel Management raise concerns about congressional oversight and how Trump and Musk view the federal bureaucracy.

item.title: Trump Media gifts DJT shares to FBI pick Kash Patel, Linda McMahon and president's son
item.description: President Donald Trump transferred his majority stake in Trump Media, whose shares trade under the DJT ticker, to his revocable trust after the electi...

item.title: Second federal judge blocks Trump funding freeze
Trump says 25% tariffs on Mexico and Canada may not include oil: 'Oil is going to have nothing to do with it as far as I’m concerned'
item.description: The president confirmed his long-threatened tariffs will come into effect on Saturday, and said they “may or may not rise with time.”
